ingredients.content: 8 oz vodka, cranberry apple flavored and pink colored
2 oz freshly squeezed lime juice (approx. 3 limes)
20 ice cubes, plus extra to fill glasses

preparations.content: Place vodka, orange liqueur, sugar, lime juice and ice cubes into mixing bowl and blend <b>1 min/speed 10<b>. Transfer into 4 glasses filled with ice and serve immediately.
